Plot: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.
Title: American Psycho
Writer: Bret Easton Ellis (novel), Mary Harron (screenplay), Guinevere Turner (screenplay)
Actors: Christian Bale, Justin Theroux, Josh Lucas, Bill Sage
tomatoConsensus: If it falls short of the deadly satire of Bret Easton Ellis's novel, American Psycho still finds its own blend of horror and humor, thanks in part to a fittingly creepy performance by Christian Bale.
